scr_ReviewsWaiting_ts.name: New changesets
scr_ReviewsWaiting_ts.desc: Number of changesets that are open (not merged nor abandoned) at the end of the specified month.

scr_ReviewsWaitingForReviewer.name: Waiting for review
scr_ReviewsWaitingForReviewer.desc: For the subset of current backlog of open changesets which are waiting for review, number of chan    gesets submitted during each month.

scr_ReviewsWaitingForReviewer_ts.name: Waiting for review
scr_ReviewsWaitingForReviewer_ts.desc: Subset of open changesets that are waiting for review (not 'WIP', with no review or just +1) at t    he end of the specified month. Open changesets with 'WIP' in the subject or with -1/-2 are not counted.

scr_review_time_pending_days_acc_median.name: Review time for pending in days
scr_review_time_pending_days_acc_median.desc: Median review time for pending submissions in days

scr_review_time_pending_ReviewsWaitingFo.name: Time from submission
scr_review_time_pending_ReviewsWaitingFo.desc: For open changesets at the end of the specified month, median time from the initial upload of tho    se changesets until the end of the specified month.

scr_review_time_pending_update_days_acc_.name: Update time for pending in days
scr_review_time_pending_update_days_acc_.desc: Median update time for pending submissions in days

scr_review_time_pending_update_ReviewsWa.name: Most recent updates
scr_review_time_pending_update_ReviewsWa.desc: Median age of changesets counting since updated (days).

scr_review_time_pending_upload_days_acc_.name: Upload time for pending in days
scr_review_time_pending_upload_days_acc_.desc: Median upload time for pending submissions in days

scr_review_time_pending_upload_ReviewsWa.name: Time from last patchset
scr_review_time_pending_upload_ReviewsWa.desc: For changesets that are still open at the end of the specified month, median time from the last p    atchset at that time until the end of the specified month.

scr_participants.name: Code review users
scr_participants.desc: Number of participants in the review process
